group_1.narration: We cleared the 3 riddles for the@soup event, and won 3 ingredients.@Back at the neighborhood association@booth, Leila and the others were waiting.

group_1.textRight: We're baaack!

group_1.textLeft: Welcome back! You sure took a while!
Guess the riddles must've stumped you!

group_1.textRight: No, it wasn't that, exactly...
Actually, I'd like to check about that@with you.
[chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Here you go♪ These are all the ingredients@we found!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa! You're really on your own level,@Mitama!
Sh-she...just...did whatever!

group_1.textRight: First is this red and white fish cake!

group_1.textLeft: Ooh! So you solved the fishmonger's problem.

group_1.textRight: Second, Himika's special Feral Sauce!

group_1.textLeft: "Feral Sauce"? What problem did you have to@solve to get that one again?

group_1.textRight: Third, the pride of the Chiakis' bento@shop: fried chicken!

group_1.textLeft: Fried...chicken?
Um, Coordinator, Kanagi...
You do know this is an event where you're@meant to gather ingredients for soup.

group_1.textRight: And? That's exactly what we did. We got@three whole ingredients!

group_1.textLeft: Well...

group_1.textRight: Uh...
So... Something IS wrong.

group_1.textLeft: Well, er, the red and white fish cake makes@sense.
But we definitely didn't give out Feral@Sauce or fried chicken in this event.

group_1.textRight: [chara:111700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]You didn't?! Oh, and we went through so@much to get them!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry...
I knew it. We were simply helping people@who had nothing to do with the event.

group_1.textRight: We were getting all these ingredients...
It never occurred to me...

group_1.textLeft: No, it was pretty obvious. Just think@about it.
Other than the first question, none of the@problems had anything to do with soup.

group_1.textRight: Hmm...and?

group_1.textLeft: Plus, fried chicken is never used in soup.

group_1.textRight: You know, I did think that was a bit odd!

group_1.textLeft: You're completely hopeless...
Um... Anyway, go ahead and take some soup,@okay?

group_1.textRight: What? Really?
We didn't gather the event ingredients.

group_1.textLeft: That doesn't change the fact that you took@part!
But what do we do with the ingredients they@got?
W-we should...only...the...the...fish cake!

group_1.textRight: My! Are you sure it's okay to leave out the@Feral Sauce and fried chicken?

group_1.textLeft: Well, um...
Mitama, I think we should try the soup as@the girls prepared it for us.
Once we've tried it by itself, you can add@whatever other ingredients you like.

group_1.textRight: Hmm. [chara:111700:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:111700:cheek_0][chara:111700:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:111700:lipSynch_1]Well, that does make sense, doesn't it?
[chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I'm so excited to try it♪

group_1.textLeft: I am, too.

group_1.textRight: Ahhh...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?! It's...exquisite.

group_1.textRight: [chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]So delicious!
This soup tastes incredible!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you so much! I'm really glad you@like it!

group_1.textCenter: Isn't Leila's cooking the best? I love it@a ton, too♪

group_1.textRight: S-so do... Me too!
(If I can just capture this flavor!)
Leila?

group_1.textLeft: Yes?

group_1.textRight: I'd really love to be able to cook this@soup again at home.
Can I...ask you for the recipe?

group_1.textLeft: Oh!
Yes! Yes, of course!

group_1.textRight: [chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Thank you!
(It's so tasty.)
(I'll recreate this soup and serve it@at the New Year's party tomorrow.)
(I know everyone will just adore it♪)
